ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 568
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ack. This is almost disgusting, but I ll list what I have. Fine Silk Turban (10ac, +10 sv fire) BS mantle Mithril BP Steel Arms Serpentine Bracers x 2
ygData.messageBody:
>Message: 17
> Date: Mon, 6 Dec 1999 15:36:01 +0000
> From: John_Senior@...
>Subject: Re: Equipment
>
>Hiya all,
>
>I thought I'd start this post because it's good to
>see what other bards
>have got inventory wise so that I know what to aim
>for......
>
>This is the stuff my only character has, which I have
>earned myself...
>
>Skull Shaped Barbute (+10 magic resist, +35 hp's)
>Two +4 Str +2 int Earings
>Plat Star Ruby Veil (+9Dex/Cha)
>Golden Black Pearl Choker (+7 Dex/Agi)
>BS Mantle (+3 Str +10 Magic resist)
>Lambent BP, Arms, Legs, Boots, Gloves, one bracer.
>Troll Hide Belt (+5 Str/Sta)
>Two +3 Str/Dex rings
>Two +5 Dex/+3 Str Bracers
>Staff of Writhing aka Ugly Stick (DMG 9 DLY 33 -9
>Cha) Effect: Chaotic Feedback
>Obsidian Scimitar (DMG 7 DLY 27 +6 Agi)
>Dragoon Dirk in Range slot (+2 Dex/+3 Magic Resist)
>
>Brass horn, Lute, flute and standard drums 8-(
>A few bags and about 100pp in cash.
>
>That's my lot, I look forward to seeing what everyone
>else has got.

Ack. This is almost disgusting, but I'll list what I
have.


Fine Silk Turban (10ac, +10 sv fire)
BS mantle
Mithril BP
Steel Arms
Serpentine Bracers x 2
Lambent Gauntlets
Lambent Greaves
Steel Booties
Golden Black Pearl Choker
Gold Star Ruby Rings x 2
1 Electrum Sapphire Earring
1 Golden Amber eaaring
Opalline Earrings x2 (for when I get charm)
Drake Hide Legs (charm)
Silk Shirt (charm)
Electrum Cat's eye Bracers (charm)
Silver Opal Necklace (charm)

ok... Weapons.

Silvery War Axe
Staff of Writhing
Short Sword of the Ykesha
(Gave my dragoon dirk to my necro)

Insturments

Lute of the Gypsy Princess
Mistmoore Battle Drums
Brahm's Horn (Wind)
Standard Brass Horn

Ok, that's all. I hope you aren't sick. I have a lot
of older friends, and they..uhm... to put it bluntly,
twink me. I buy a lot of my own stuff, but most of my
REALLY good stuff has all been given to me.



Double Entendre
